questions.question: What is the dominant color of the picture frame's outer border?
What is the apparent material of the picture frame's visible construction?
What is the overall shape of the outer frame's visible perimeter?
What color is the visible matting that surrounds the central image area?
Describe the apparent texture of the outer frame's visible surface?
What is the primary design element visible on the inner mat?
What is the apparent width of the wooden frame's border, in relation to the frame's overall dimensions?
Is the frame's profile consistently rectilinear or does it show any curves or bevels?
Considering the visible joinery, how does the frame appear to be assembled?
Does the inner mat have a noticeable visible texture, rough or smooth?
Does the outer frame's color appear consistent across its visible surface?
Is there any visible surface treatment on the outer frame (e.g., gloss, matte)?
Considering the logo's location, is it centrally placed within the inner mat?
What is the visible style of the lettering in the logo that is visible?
Ignoring the logo, are there any other visible markings on the frame?
